## jamestest

The **Joint Anthropometric Measurement and Evaluation System (JAMES)**
is an **experimental** online resource for creating and analysing
growth charts.

This `jamestest` package implements a Shiny website to test JAMES 
tools on a set of demo children.

## Resources

- https://github.com/stefvanbuuren/james
